com.blukii.sdk.config

Interface FirmwareUpdateListener


  • public interface FirmwareUpdateListener
    Listener for function Blukii.updateFirmware(FirmwareUpdateListener).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFirmwareUpdateDone(FirmwareUpdateStatus status)
      Is called when asynchronous function Blukii.updateFirmware(FirmwareUpdateListener) is finished.
      boolean onProgress(FirmwareUpdateProgress progress, java.lang.Object data)
      Is called if update progress step is started.

    • Method Detail

      • onFirmwareUpdateDone

        void onFirmwareUpdateDone(FirmwareUpdateStatus status)
        Is called when asynchronous function Blukii.updateFirmware(FirmwareUpdateListener) is finished.

        It returns the update success or error status and a list of updated BlukiiActions and errors.

        Parameters:
        status - success or error state

      • onProgress

        boolean onProgress(FirmwareUpdateProgress progress,
                   java.lang.Object data)
        Is called if update progress step is started.

        Firmware update runs through several steps. At the beginning of each step the callback is called.

        Some of these provide additional information:

        • FirmwareUpdateProgress.PrepareDevice: source firmware version (String)
        • FirmwareUpdateProgress.IdentifyImage: target firmware version (String)
        • FirmwareUpdateProgress.TransferImage: transfer progress in % (int)
        Parameters:
        progress - starting progress step
        data - progress step dependent data
        Returns:
        true, if firmware update should be canceled
